[invenio_assets.webpack]
oai_batch_ui = oarepo_oaipmh_harvester.ui.oai_batch.theme.webpack:theme
oai_harvester_ui = oarepo_oaipmh_harvester.ui.oai_harvester.theme.webpack:theme
oai_record_ui = oarepo_oaipmh_harvester.ui.oai_record.theme.webpack:theme
oai_run_ui = oarepo_oaipmh_harvester.ui.oai_run.theme.webpack:theme
